title: Permanent Ban x 22
body:

It was a velkoz and he kept running down mid intentionally feeding over and over and then he reported me and I got banned. Harassed by a riot employee?

All i see is you being incredibly toxic. Nothing of value was lost.
I'm not toxic. I'm not threatening anyone I'm not harassing anyone. I'm not making direct statements that are verbally abusive in any manner towards any specific person.

> [{quoted}](name=Sad8Face,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=3gcOltk1,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-09-04T20:38:10.470+0000)
>
> I'm not toxic. I'm not threatening anyone I'm not harassing anyone. I'm not making direct statements that are verbally abusive in any manner towards any specific person.

Honestly dude, get your head out of your butt. You are deliberately being toxic and inflammatory. If this is your 22nd account ban (didn't think that was actually possible) you might want to try changing your behavior. It can be easy to get frustrated in competitive play but take into account and ask yourself if it is worth it losing your account?

Then again since this is allegedly your "22nd" ban, I don't think you care and I'm surprised you haven't been IP banned.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lhckuhUxcgA
Yes it is and that is in fact a Riot employee. Every time I post a screen shot of what he said to me it gets taken down and my thread gets deleted.

> [{quoted}](name=Sad8Face,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=3gcOltk1,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-04T20:33:28.363+0000)
>
> Yes it is and the that is in fact a Riot employee. Every time I post a screen shot of what he said to me it gets taken down and my thread gets deleted.

I can't take this post seriously IF THIS IS YOUR 22TH BANNED ACCOUNT!!!!!!
That happens with any person that you screenshot Riot member or not...
Hi there Tyler.

If you received chat logs when you logged in, then this very likely wasn't a manual review suspension, but rather an Instant Feedback suspension. These suspensions are given after excessive and/or consistent toxicity and negativity across multiple matches. While the accusations that you bring up against a Rioter is concerning to me, your actions and behavior as displayed in your chat logs are not acceptable in any circumstance. Please take this punishment as a learning experience, as this sort of behavior does not translate well into the real world. If there's anything else you'd like to discuss, hopefully I can address it for you!
In the real world there are no bans. In the real world there is a thing called freedom of speech. In the real world you have to learn to deal with people who have negative opinions of you.

> [{quoted}](name=Sad8Face,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=3gcOltk1,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-09-04T20:50:18.028+0000)
>
> In the real world there are no bans. In the real world there is a thing called freedom of speech. In the real world you have to learn to deal with people who have negative opinions of you.

In the real world you can get arrested for poor behavior. In the real world Freedom of Speech has its limits and it doesn't protect you from the consequences of what you say (LoL isn't the real world though so Freedom of Speech doesn't apply here at all whatsoever). In the real world you don't harass people just because they have a different opinion of you.

In the real world I can say whatever I want. I can verbally harass someone if I want to and not be fined or go to jail. If someone assaults me for the things I say to them then they are the ones breaking the law not me. You should really learn the law before you make inaccurate statements. Freedom of speech has a wide reach. It covers pretty much everything except for yelling things like "bomb!" in a crowded area.
Slander, libel, and harassment are all things that people in the United States have protections against, though.

I actually know the legal system fairly well. Im allowed to verbally assault you in real life if I please. I just cannot verbally harass you on a daily basis. If i ran into you in real life and wanted to tell you how much of an asshole you are then I'm legally allowed to do so. I never slandered you in anyway or made any false statements about you.

nice example of you shouting obscenities on the street! but if you start harassing people in a privately owned establishment, like league, the owners have every right to remove you because they dont like your behavior.

> [{quoted}](name=Sad8Face,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=3gcOltk1,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-09-04T20:50:18.028+0000)

Umm I don't think this guy is part of Riot..

You were toxic till the end, it may look OKAY at first but harassing someone till they cant take it is very tilt worthy and puts them in a  bad mood. You got banned because of this and you still did it after many games, i understand you but you should at least just not flame or do anything of that matter. Rage outside of the game, people do not wanna hear you harass them and rage at the jungle.
Take this into advice and you may be able to reform.
Good luck with the reform, if you try.
